original_title: Knuffle Bunny Free: An Unexpected Diversion
overview: This is the third and final book in the Knuffle Bunny trilogy. Trixie and her family set off on a fantastic trip to visit her grandparents in Holland! But it seems Knuffle Bunny has different plans. Join Trixie on this international adventure as she makes a very surprising and moving decision.
title: Knuffle Bunny Free: An Unexpected Diversion
